subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Some of the world's top players, including Andy Roddick, who dropped out of the Davis Cup this year, say the competition's format is ill suited to this era and to increasing physical demands.
snippet: Some of the world's top players, including Andy Roddick, who dropped out of the Davis Cup this year, say the competition's format is ill suited to this era and to increasing physical demands.
